message.content: cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.DM, cs.AI. This paper deals with a fundamental problem in Computational Geometry, specifically the Art Gallery problem, which is a well-known problem in the field of computational geometry. The paper also utilizes structural properties of almost convex polygons, which falls under the category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The use of reduction techniques and constraint satisfaction problems suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-categories of computational complexity (cs.CC) and discrete mathematics (cs.DM). Additionally, the paper presents an algorithmic approach, which may be of interest to the sub-category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
